subject: College Athletics
Football
lead_paragraph: The nomadic linebacker Willie Williams has new home. Less than a week after the N.C.A.A. denied an appeal to restore his eligibility at Division II Glenville State College, he transferred to Union College, an N.A.I.A. school in Kentucky. Williams, a fifth-year senior who is now at his fifth school, is eligible to play this season. On Friday, he practiced with Union for the first time.
